pledgeItems.description: Turn off the tap when not in use.
pledgeItems.detail: Turn off the tap while brushing your teeth.

pledgeItems.description: Reduce my use of disposable water bottles.
pledgeItems.detail: Consider getting a reusable water or use drinking fountains.

pledgeItems.description: Turn off lights when not in use.
pledgeItems.detail: When you leave a room, turn off the lights.
Look for the Energy Star label.

pledgeItems.description: Unplug or turn off appliances when not in use.
pledgeItems.detail: Your charger uses power even if your devices are not connected.

pledgeItems.description: Minimize paper waste and use both sides when possible.
pledgeItems.detail: Print on both sides of paper if needed, or even avoid printing.

pledgeItems.description: Minimize shower time to less than 5 minutes.
pledgeItems.detail: Take a shorter shower and consider reducing the temperature.

pledgeItems.description: Walk, bike, or carpool when possible and safe.
pledgeItems.detail: Live closeby? Consider walking. Otherwise, ride with trusted friends.
Avoid using a dishwasher and do it by hand. Plus, you can make it extra sparkly.

pledgeItems.description: Advocate for water and energy conservation.
pledgeItems.detail: Tell your friends how to conserve water and energy! Share the pledge with them.
